name: Crazy Pizza
description:
Making pizza in a post-apocalyptic car.

X360 controller required for car controls: Left stick for direction and triggers for acceleration.

Keyboard required for pizza controls: Q/A,W/Z,E,R to add toppings, X to reset the pizza.

It’s a co-op game and uses a custom engine. There’s no delivery for the pizza, you could say that the goal is simply to get the highest score on the current pizza.

  • Lucien - programmer
  • Linheha - graphic designer
  • Legulysse - music composer
